item.title: Change the xp rate in rscd v25

item.description:
@Jaghetermario wrote:

F:\CREW\Crew Pk\src\org\rscdaemon\server\util\Formulae

		}
		return -1;
	}
	
	/**
	 * Calculate how much experience a Mob gives
	 */
	public static int combatExperience(Mob mob) {
		double exp = ((mob.getCombatLevel() * 4) + 9) * 45D;
		return (int)(mob instanceof Player? (exp / 4D) : exp);
	}

Hope this helps for some poeple.
